K10D0112_H0115:328a-25: de'i dus na sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad
K10D0112_H0115:328a-26: du me tog sngon po'i tshar dag kyang rab tu
K10D0112_H0115:328a-27: byung ba sems can thams cad kyis kyang dri de
K10D0112_H0115:328b-0: @328b tshor bar gyur nas de dag thams cad kyi
K10D0112_H0115:328b-1: khams rnams kyang snyoms shing mi mthun pa med par
K10D0112_H0115:328b-2: gnas par gyur / de na sems can thams cad
K10D0112_H0115:328b-3: la nad med cing gnod pa med par gyur pa
K10D0112_H0115:328b-4: gnas par gyur / dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa /
K10D0112_H0115:328b-5: snying rje brtul zhugs dul ba'i sems longs shig /
K10D0112_H0115:328b-6: 'jig rten mgon po mang po mchod 'gyur zhing //
K10D0112_H0115:328b-7: nyon mongs g-yo mdud dam po gcod 'gyur te //
K10D0112_H0115:328b-8: dge ba dam pa shes rab mdzod du 'gyur ////
K10D0112_H0115:328b-9: bam po brgyad pa rigs kyi bu bram ze de'i
K10D0112_H0115:328b-10: slob ma bye ba phrag gsum kun dga'i ra ba'i
K10D0112_H0115:328b-11: sgo na 'dug pa de dag gis kyang sems can
K10D0112_H0115:328b-12: 'ongs pa rnams gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la
K10D0112_H0115:328b-13: bkod cing byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug
K10D0112_H0115:328b-15: de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis slob ma de dag la smras pa /
K10D0112_H0115:328b-17: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
K10D0112_H0115:328b-18: chub tu sems bskyed la sangs rgyas kyi zhang gi
K10D0112_H0115:328b-19: yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa dag
K10D0112_H0115:328b-20: kyang longs shig / smon lam ji lta bu 'dod
K10D0112_H0115:328b-21: pa dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thob
K10D0112_H0115:328b-22: kyang longs shig / cig / de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma'i khyu mchog gis smras pa /
K10D0112_H0115:328b-25: spyod pa ji lta bu dang /
K10D0112_H0115:329a-0: rjes su dran pa ji lta bus byang @329a *//
K10D0112_H0115:329a-3: bram ze'i khye'u byang chub kyi lam la zhugs pa'i
K10D0112_H0115:329a-4: byang chub sems dpas mi zad pa'i mdzod bzhi po
K10D0112_H0115:329a-5: 'di dag yang dag par bsgrub par bya ste /
K10D0112_H0115:329a-7: bsod nams kyi tshogs mi zad pa dang /
K10D0112_H0115:329a-8: ye shes kyi tshogs mi zad pa dang /
K10D0112_H0115:329a-9: shes rab kyi tshogs mi zad pa dang /
K10D0112_H0115:329a-10: chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa'i tshogs mi zad pa ste /
K10D0112_H0115:329a-12: lam de ni de lta bu yin no //
K10D0112_H0115:329a-13: bram ze'i khye'u de bzhin gshegs pas kyang 'di skad
K10D0112_H0115:329a-14: du byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshogs rnam par
K10D0112_H0115:329a-15: dag pa sdud pa zhes bya ba tshogs nyams su
K10D0112_H0115:329a-17: chos kyi sgo sbyin pa'i tshogs yongs su gtod bar byed de /
K10D0112_H0115:329a-18: des ni 'dul ba'i sems can yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro //
K10D0112_H0115:329a-19: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi tshogs
K10D0112_H0115:329a-20: ni smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur
K10D0112_H0115:329a-21: ro // byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa'i
K10D0112_H0115:329a-22: tshogs ni mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su
K10D0112_H0115:329a-24: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus kyi tshogs ni dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
K10D0112_H0115:329a-25: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi tshogs
K10D0112_H0115:329b-0: ni cang shes kyi sems su byed @329b bar 'gyur
K10D0112_H0115:329b-1: ro // byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab
K10D0112_H0115:329b-2: kyi tshogs ni nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su
K10D0112_H0115:329b-4: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thos pa'i tshogs ni
K10D0112_H0115:329b-5: rtogs pa thogs pa med par byed par 'gyur ro
K10D0112_H0115:329b-6: // byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsod nams kyi
K10D0112_H0115:329b-7: tshogs ni sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar
K10D0112_H0115:329b-9: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs
K10D0112_H0115:329b-10: ni shes pa thogs pa med par bye dpar 'gyur
K10D0112_H0115:329b-11: ro // byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi zhi gnas
K10D0112_H0115:329b-12: kyi tshogs ni sems las su rung bar byed par
K10D0112_H0115:329b-13: ro // 'gyur ro // byang chub sems dpa' rnams
K10D0112_H0115:329b-14: kyi lhag mthong gi tshogs ni the tshom dang bral
K10D0112_H0115:329b-16: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa'i tshogs ni
K10D0112_H0115:329b-17: zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems su byed par 'gyur
K10D0112_H0115:329b-18: ro // byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje'i
K10D0112_H0115:329b-19: tshogs ni 'dul ba la mi skyo bar byed par
K10D0112_H0115:329b-20: ro // 'gyur ro // byang chub sems dpa' rnams
K10D0112_H0115:329b-21: kyi dga' ba'i tshogs ni chos kyi kun dga' la
K10D0112_H0115:329b-22: dga' mos par byed par 'gyur ro //
K10D0112_H0115:329b-23: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi btang snyoms kyi tshogs ni rjes su chags pa dang /
K10D0112_H0115:329b-24: khong khro ba spong bar byed par 'gyur ro //
K10D0112_H0115:329b-25: byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi chos nyan pa'i tshogs ni sgrib pa spong bar byed par 'gyur ro //
K10D0112_H0115:330a-1: sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par 'byung ba'i tshogs ni
K10D0112_H0115:330a-2: yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad spong bar byed par
K10D0112_H0115:330a-3: 'gyur ro // byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dgon
K10D0112_H0115:330a-4: par gnas pa'i tshogs ni dge ba'i las byas pa
K10D0112_H0115:330a-5: chud mi za bar byed par 'gyur ro //
K10D0112_H0115:330a-6: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba spel ba
K10D0112_H0115:330a-7: sgom pa'i tshogs ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
K10D0112_H0115:330a-9: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa'i tshogs ni gzungs thob par byed par 'gyur ro //
K10D0112_H0115:330a-10: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi blo gros kyi tshogs ni blo'i bye brag 'byed par 'gyur ro //
K10D0112_H0115:330a-11: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa'i tshogs ni
K10D0112_H0115:330a-12: don gyi rnam pa'i rjes su rtogs par byed par
K10D0112_H0115:330a-13: 'gyur ro // byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa nye bar bzhag ba'i tshogs ni lus dang /
K10D0112_H0115:330a-16: chos la so sor rtog par byed par 'gyur ro //
K10D0112_H0115:330a-17: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag pa'i spong
K10D0112_H0115:330a-18: ba'i tshogs ni dge ba'i chos thams cad bsgom pa
K10D0112_H0115:330a-19: yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'gyur ro //
K10D0112_H0115:330a-20: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i tshogs ni lus dang /
K10D0112_H0115:330a-21: sems yang ba nyid du byed par 'gyur ro //
K10D0112_H0115:330a-22: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po'i tshogs ni
K10D0112_H0115:330b-0: sdom pa yongs su rdzogs par byed @330b par 'gyur
K10D0112_H0115:330b-1: ro // byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs kyi
K10D0112_H0115:330b-2: tshogs ni nyon mongs pa thams cad 'joms par byed
K10D0112_H0115:330b-3: ro // par 'gyur ro // byang chub sems dpa'
K10D0112_H0115:330b-4: rnams kyi byang chub kyi yan lag gi tshogs ni
K10D0112_H0115:330b-5: chos kyi ngo bo nyid khong du chud par byed
K10D0112_H0115:330b-7: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying por byed pa
K10D0112_H0115:330b-8: drug gi tshogs ni 'dul ba'i sems can rnams yongs
K10D0112_H0115:330b-9: su dag par byed par 'gyur ro //
K10D0112_H0115:330b-11: bram ze'i khye'u tshogs rnam par dag pa sdud pa
K10D0112_H0115:330b-12: zhes bya ba de ni tshogs nyams su lon par
K10D0112_H0115:330b-13: byed pa'i chos kyi sgo yin no //
K10D0112_H0115:330b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyin pa'i tshogs ni longs spyod chen po dang /
K10D0112_H0115:330b-16: g-yog 'khor mang por 'gyur bar gsungs la /
K10D0112_H0115:330b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshul khrims ni mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10D0112_H0115:330b-18: thos pas ni shes rab chen por 'gyur ba dang /
K10D0112_H0115:330b-21: sgom pa ni 'khor ba las rgal bar byed n par bstan to //
K10D0112_H0115:330b-22: mdun na 'don gyis smras pa dang /
K10D0112_H0115:330b-23: bram ze'i khyuru' gang dag 'khor ba la mngon par
K10D0112_H0115:330b-24: dga' ba rnams ni sbyin pa spyin par byed de
K10D0112_H0115:330b-26: de'ang 'di skad du rigs kyi bu'am /
K10D0112_H0115:330b-27: rigs kyi bu mo gang dag byang chub kyi lam
K10D0112_H0115:330b-28: la zhugs pa de dag gis ni rul ba'i sems
K10D0112_H0115:330b-29: kyi sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o //
K10D0112_H0115:331a-0: zhi gnas kyi sems kyis tshul @331a *//
K10D0112_H0115:331a-2: rnyog pa med pa'i sems kyis thos pa yongs su btsal bar bya'o //
K10D0112_H0115:331a-3: snying rje chen po'i sems kyis bsgom pa bsgom par bya'o //
K10D0112_H0115:331a-4: chos lhag ma rnams kyang shes rab dang /
K10D0112_H0115:331a-6: thabs kyi tshogs yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir yongs
K10D0112_H0115:331a-7: su btsal bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste;
K10D0112_H0115:331a-8: bram ze'i khye'u / de ni byang chub kyi lam yin no //
K10D0112_H0115:331a-9: tshogs de lta bus byang chub thob par 'gyur te /
K10D0112_H0115:331a-11: bsgom pa ni de lta bu yin /
K10D0112_H0115:331a-12: dran pa ni de lta bu yin; byang chub kyi
K10D0112_H0115:331a-13: lam gyi spyod pa ni de lta bu yin gyi
K10D0112_H0115:331a-15: byang chub tu 'dun pa skyed cig /
K10D0112_H0115:331a-17: byang chub kyi lam ni yang dag pa yin gyi /
K10D0112_H0115:331a-18: bsam pa thag pa nas smon lam thob cig dang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K10D0112_H0115:331a-20: bsam pa thag pas byang chub kyi lam ni dang ba yin no //
K10D0112_H0115:331a-22: g-yo med pas rnam par dag pa ste /
K10D0112_H0115:331a-23: nyon mongs pa rab tu bsal bas byang chub kyi lam ni drang ba yin no //
K10D0112_H0115:331a-25: bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar
K10D0112_H0115:331a-26: thug pas byang chub kyi lam ni grub pa dang
K10D0112_H0115:331a-28: smon lam thob la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su dag pa'am /
K10D0112_H0115:331b-0: yongs su ma dag pa ji @331b lta bu 'dod pa long zhig /
K10D0112_H0115:331b-2: de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma'i khyu mchog gis
K10D0112_H0115:331b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan
K10D0112_H0115:331b-4: sngar pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs
K10D0112_H0115:331b-5: te 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0112_H0115:331b-7: bdag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par
K10D0112_H0115:331b-8: rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi ste
K10D0112_H0115:331b-9: / sems can 'dod chags chung ba rnams dang /
K10D0112_H0115:331b-10: zhe sdang chung ba rnams dang /
K10D0112_H0115:331b-11: gti mug chung ba rnams dang /
K10D0112_H0115:331b-12: sems 'khrul pa ma mchis zhing ma 'khrul ba rnams dang /
K10D0112_H0115:331b-13: 'khon pa'i sems ma mchis pa rnams dang /
K10D0112_H0115:331b-14: phrag dog dang ser sna'i sems rnam par spangs pa rnams dang /
K10D0112_H0115:331b-15: log par lta ba'i sems yongs su spangs pa rnams dang /
K10D0112_H0115:331b-16: yang dag pa'i lta ba'i sems la gnas pa rnams dang /
K10D0112_H0115:331b-17: dge bar sems pa rnams dang /
K10D0112_H0115:331b-18: dge ba yongs su tshol bar sems pa rnams dang /
K10D0112_H0115:331b-19: ngan song gsum gyi lam rnam par spong bar sems pa rnams dang /
K10D0112_H0115:331b-20: mtho ris kyi lam gsum la brtson par sems pa rnams dang /
K10D0112_H0115:331b-21: bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gsum po dag gis
K10D0112_H0115:331b-22: dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par sdud pa rnams
K10D0112_H0115:331b-23: dang / theg pa gsum po dag la brtson par
K10D0112_H0115:331b-24: sems dpa' rnams kyi slad du bdag kyang sangs rgyas
K10D0112_H0115:331b-25: kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can 'dir bla na med
K10D0112_H0115:332a-0: pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang @332a *//
K10D0112_H0115:332a-1: chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig /
K10D0112_H0115:332a-3: gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs
K10D0112_H0115:332a-4: su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na de'i slad du
K10D0112_H0115:332a-5: bdag gi sug pa lag pa gnyis su glang po
K10D0112_H0115:332a-6: che'i gtso bo dag 'byung bar gyur cig /
K10D0112_H0115:332a-7: tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu bcom ldan
K10D0112_H0115:332a-8: 'das kyi mthus de'i lag pa gnyis su glang po
K10D0112_H0115:332a-9: che'i gtso bo thal kar yan lag bdun shin tu
K10D0112_H0115:332a-10: gnas pa dag byung bar gyur pa mthong nas /
K10D0112_H0115:332a-12: khyed cag cung zad tsam zhig thams cad dang ldan
K10D0112_H0115:332a-13: pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i steng gi nam mkha'
K10D0112_H0115:332a-14: la deng la / yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i
K10D0112_H0115:332a-15: char shin tu dri zhim pa dag gis sangs rgyas
K10D0112_H0115:332a-16: kyi zhing 'di nas sems can thams cad sad par
K10D0112_H0115:332a-17: la deng la / gyis shig / de'i thigs pas sems can thams cad sad par gyis shig /
K10D0112_H0115:332a-18: de'i thigs pas sems can gang dag gi lus la phog gam /
K10D0112_H0115:332a-19: gang dag gis dri tshor bar gyur pa de dag gi sgrib pa lnga spangs par gyur cig /
K10D0112_H0115:332a-21: 'dod pa la 'dun pa'i sgrib pa spangs par gyur cig /
K10D0112_H0115:332a-27: the tshom gyi sgrib pa sbyangs par gyur cig /
K10D0112_H0115:332a-28: tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu glang po
K10D0112_H0115:332a-29: che de dag steng gi bar snang la 'di ltar
K10D0112_H0115:332b-3: skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas lag pa brkyad pa las bskum pa'am /
K10D0112_H0115:332b-4: bskum pa las brkyang pa de bzhin du de ltar
K10D0112_H0115:332b-5: mgyogs par dong nas; glang po che'i gtso bo de
K10D0112_H0115:332b-6: dag gis ji skad sngar smras pa'i bya ba dag
K10D0112_H0115:332b-7: byas nas phyir log ste de'i mdun du la bod
K10D0112_H0115:332b-9: de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma'i khyu mchog shin tu yid dga' bar gyur pa dang /
K10D0112_H0115:332b-10: de la de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa /
K10D0112_H0115:332b-11: rigs kyi bu khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na
K10D0112_H0115:332b-12: bskal pa grangs med pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma
K10D0112_H0115:332b-13: snyed gnyis pa la bab na bskal pa sgra snang
K10D0112_H0115:332b-14: zhes bya ba la gling bzhi pa 'dir sangs rgyas
K10D0112_H0115:332b-15: kyi zhing sgra yang dag par bsags pa zhes bya
K10D0112_H0115:332b-16: ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin gshegs pa
K10D0112_H0115:332b-17: rin po che chen po'i gdugs mngon par 'phags pa'i
K10D0112_H0115:332b-18: 'od zer zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
K10D0112_H0115:332b-21: de nas byang chub sems dpa' skar ma'i khyu mchog gis /
K10D0112_H0115:332b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas gtugs pa dang /
K10D0112_H0115:332b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa /
K10D0112_H0115:332b-24: rdul dang rnam bral sems can rnam dag longs //
K10D0112_H0115:332b-25: khyod kyi sems can bye mang lung bstan to //
K10D0112_H0115:332b-26: byang chub phyir ni rab dag lam sbyong zhing /
K10D0112_H0115:333a-4: bram ze'i khye'u bye ba phrag gsum po gang dag
K10D0112_H0115:333a-5: gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir bla na med pa
K10D0112_H0115:333a-6: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam
K10D0112_H0115:333a-7: btab pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs
K10D0112_H0115:333a-8: pa rin po che'i snying pos lung bstan te /
K10D0112_H0115:333a-9: tha ma ni sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs dang /
K10D0112_H0115:333a-11: thams cad skyob kyi bar dag tu 'gyur ro //
K10D0112_H0115:333a-12: bram ze'i khye'u lung bstan pa de dag thams cad
K10D0112_H0115:333a-13: las gang dag rig byed klog pa'i bram ze stong
K10D0112_H0115:333a-14: zhig yod pa'i thu bo mang pos bla mar bkur
K10D0112_H0115:333a-15: ba khyab 'jug rlung zhes bya ba des gsol pa
K10D0112_H0115:333a-16: / bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga
K10D0112_H0115:333a-17: dang ldan par bla na med pa yang dag par
K10D0112_H0115:333a-18: rdzogs pa'i byang chub la reg par gyur cig /
K10D0112_H0115:333a-21: gti mug bdo ba'i sems can rnams la chos ston par gyur cig /
K10D0112_H0115:333a-22: bram ze'i khye'u skar ma skyong zhes bya ba des smras pa /
K10D0112_H0115:333a-23: kye mkhan po khyab 'jug rlung 'dis don gyi dbang
K10D0112_H0115:333a-24: ji zhig mthong na sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma
K10D0112_H0115:333a-25: lnga dang ldan par smon lam 'debs par bgyid lags
K10D0112_H0115:333a-27: snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems
K10D0112_H0115:333a-28: dpa' gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing
K10D0112_H0115:333b-0: snyigs ma lnga dang @333b ldan par byang chub thob
K10D0112_H0115:333b-1: par byed cing / sems can skyabs med pa rnams dang /
K10D0112_H0115:333b-2: dpung gnyen med pa rnams dang /
K10D0112_H0115:333b-3: nyon mongs pa ngag gis gtses pa rnams dang /
K10D0112_H0115:333b-4: lta bas nyon mongs par gyur pa rnams kyi don
K10D0112_H0115:333b-5: byed cing skyabs dang dpung gnyen du 'gyur ba dang

K10D0112_H0115:431a-3: de'i slad du bdag khyod kyi spyan sngar mchis nas gsol ba bgyid lags so //
K10D0112_H0115:431a-5: de nas rgyal po bsod nams stobs 'di snyam du sems te /
K10D0112_H0115:431a-6: bdag gis stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba nyid thob
K10D0112_H0115:431a-7: nas sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag cig
K10D0112_H0115:431a-8: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod
K10D0112_H0115:431a-9: cing / theg pa gsum po dag la'ang nges par sbyar te /
K10D0112_H0115:431a-10: bdag gis sbyin pa'ang dpag tu med pa zhig byin na /
K10D0112_H0115:431a-11: de ni snying po med pa'i lus las snying po len par byed pa zhig ste /
K10D0112_H0115:431a-12: bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin no snyam nas rgyal pos smras pa /
K10D0112_H0115:431a-13: ngas khyod la sha'i mig tha mal pa 'di sbyin par bya'i /
K10D0112_H0115:431a-15: des ni bdag gis bla na med pa'i chos kyi spyan thob par gyur cig /
K10D0112_H0115:431a-16: ngas khyod la rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis rang gi pags pa 'di'ang sbyin par bya'i /
K10D0112_H0115:431a-17: des ni bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur cig /
K10D0112_H0115:431a-19: de nas rgyal po bsod nams stobs kyis lag pa
K10D0112_H0115:431a-20: g-yas pas rang gi mig gnyis phyung ste 'tsho ba
K10D0112_H0115:431b-0: pa la byin nas gdong khrag gis yog bzhin @431b
K10D0112_H0115:431b-1: du smras pa / 'di na gang dag 'dir lhags pa dang /
K10D0112_H0115:431b-2: nam mkha' la rgyu ba dang /
K10D0112_H0115:431b-3: sa la gnas pa'i lha rnams dang /
K10D0112_H0115:431b-4: gnod sbyin mthu chen po rnams dang /
K10D0112_H0115:431b-5: mi'am ci gang yin pa rnams dang /
K10D0112_H0115:431b-6: lha ma yin gang yin pa rnams dang /
K10D0112_H0115:431b-7: 'byung po gang yin pa rnams dang /
K10D0112_H0115:431b-8: mi gang yin pa rnams bdag la nyon cig /
K10D0112_H0115:431b-9: bdag gis sbyin pa byang chub tu bsngos pa'i dge bas zhi ba'i go 'phang thob par gyur nas /
K10D0112_H0115:431b-10: bdag gis sems can rnams 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho mi
K10D0112_H0115:431b-11: zad pa las sgrol zhing bla na med pa'i zhi
K10D0112_H0115:431b-12: ba mya ngan las 'das pa la 'god par gyur
K10D0112_H0115:431b-14: gal te bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag
K10D0112_H0115:431b-15: par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ba lta
K10D0112_H0115:431b-16: na / ji srid du 'tsho ba pa 'di'i rig
K10D0112_H0115:431b-17: sngags de grub par ma gyur pa de srid kyi
K10D0112_H0115:431b-18: bar du bdag gi srog gi dbang po 'gag par
K10D0112_H0115:431b-19: na / ma gyur cig / bdag gi dran pa'ang nyams par ma gyur cig /
K10D0112_H0115:431b-20: bdag 'gyod par yang ma gyur cig /
K10D0112_H0115:431b-22: rgyal pos pags pa'ang khyer cig ces smras pa /
K10D0112_H0115:431b-23: 'tsho ba pa rdul dbyangs des mtshon rnon po blangs te /
K10D0112_H0115:431b-24: rgyal po gson po'i lus las pags pa bshus nas pags pa khyer te rig sngags bsgrubs so //
K10D0112_H0115:431b-25: de ltar zhag bdun gyi bar du rgyal po bsod nams stobs kyi srog gi dbang po'ang ma 'gags /
K10D0112_H0115:432a-1: bsngal gyi tshor ba de'ang mi myong la /
K10D0112_H0115:432a-2: de la skad cig tsam yang 'gyod pa skyes par ma gyur to //
K10D0112_H0115:432a-5: de'i tshe de'i dus na snying rje chen po dang
K10D0112_H0115:432a-6: ldan pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig
K10D0112_H0115:432a-7: yin pa snyam du 'dzin na gzhan du mi blta
K10D0112_H0115:432a-8: ste / nga de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin
K10D0112_H0115:432a-9: gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i yab snying rje
K10D0112_H0115:432a-10: chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba der gyur
K10D0112_H0115:432a-11: ste / to // ngas bla na med pa yang
K10D0112_H0115:432a-12: dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par
K10D0112_H0115:432a-13: gyur pa'i dang po ni de yin no //
K10D0112_H0115:432a-14: ngas dang po sems bskyed pas sems can bgrang ba
K10D0112_H0115:432a-15: las 'das pa dag bla na med pa yang dag
K10D0112_H0115:432a-16: par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du
K10D0112_H0115:432a-17: bcug ste / nga'i dpa' ba'i dngos po dang /
K10D0112_H0115:432a-18: dpa' bo'i bya ba dang po ni de yin no //
K10D0112_H0115:432a-19: nga smon lam gyi dbang gis de nas shi 'phos
K10D0112_H0115:432a-20: nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag 'dren du gdol
K10D0112_H0115:432a-21: pa'i rigs su skyes pa de'i tshe na /
K10D0112_H0115:432a-22: ngas gdol ba'i rigs su gnas nas sems can rnams
K10D0112_H0115:432a-23: dge ba la sbyar cing rang gi stobs dang rtul
K10D0112_H0115:432a-24: bas stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba nyid thob pa'i
K10D0112_H0115:432a-25: bar dang / dzambu'i gling thams cad du 'thab pa
K10D0112_H0115:432a-26: dang rtsod pa'i rnyog pa rnams rab tu zhi bar
K10D0112_H0115:432a-27: bar dang / byas shing / tshe'ang bsrings te ngas
K10D0112_H0115:432a-28: dang po lus yongs su btang ba de ni nga'i
K10D0112_H0115:432b-1: dpa' bo'i bya ba gnyis pa yin no //
K10D0112_H0115:432b-2: gang gi tshe ngas rang gi mig dag yongs su
K10D0112_H0115:432b-3: btang zhing rang gi pags pa'ang yongs su btang ste
K10D0112_H0115:432b-4: / de nas shi 'phos na'ang smon lam gyi dbang
K10D0112_H0115:432b-5: gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag 'dren de nyid
K10D0112_H0115:432b-6: kyi gling gnyis par gdol pa'i rigs su skyes nas
K10D0112_H0115:432b-7: snga ma bzhin du sbyar te /
K10D0112_H0115:432b-8: der yang ngas brtson 'grus brtan zhing rtul ba de
K10D0112_H0115:432b-9: lta bus sems can rnams dge ba'i las dag la
K10D0112_H0115:432b-10: nges par sbyar nas stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i
K10D0112_H0115:432b-15: 'gyod pa dag rab tu zhi bar byas te tshe'ang bsrings so //
K10D0112_H0115:432b-16: der yang rang gi lus las lce dang /
K10D0112_H0115:432b-17: rna ba dag yongs su btang ba na sangs rgyas
K10D0112_H0115:432b-18: kyi zhing yang dag 'dren gyi stong chen po de
K10D0112_H0115:432b-19: kun gyi gling thams cad kyi bar du'ang skyes bu'i
K10D0112_H0115:432b-20: rtsal de lta bu dag byas so //
K10D0112_H0115:432b-21: smon lam dang brtson 'grus brtan zhing rtul pa rjes su 'brel pa dang /
K10D0112_H0115:432b-22: smon lam gyi dbang gis snyigs ma lnga dang ldan
K10D0112_H0115:432b-23: pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma
K10D0112_H0115:432b-24: snyed dag tu'ang sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba
K10D0112_H0115:432b-25: de dag la nges par sbyar cing theg pa gsum
K10D0112_H0115:432b-26: po dag yang dag par 'dzin du bcug ste /
K10D0112_H0115:432b-27: 'thab pa dang rtsod pa'i rnyog pa dang /
K10D0112_H0115:433a-1: rnams rab tu zhi bar byas shing skyes bu chen po'i rtsal de lta bu dag byas so //
K10D0112_H0115:433a-3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan dag gi sangs rgyas
K10D0112_H0115:433a-4: kyi zhing yongs su dag pa ni 'di'i phyir te
K10D0112_H0115:433a-5: / gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de
K10D0112_H0115:433a-6: dag sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
K10D0112_H0115:433a-7: pa'i byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na gzhan
K10D0112_H0115:433a-8: gyi ltung ba gleng bar mi byed cing gzhan la
K10D0112_H0115:433a-9: 'jigs pa ston par mi byed la /
K10D0112_H0115:433a-10: sems can rnams nyan thos dang /
K10D0112_H0115:433a-11: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang dag par 'dzin du ma bcug pas na /
K10D0112_H0115:433a-12: de'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa yongs
K10D0112_H0115:433a-13: su rdzogs pa de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
K10D0112_H0115:433a-14: yongs su dag par gyur te /
K10D0112_H0115:433a-15: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na ltung ba'i ming yang med la /
K10D0112_H0115:433a-18: mi dge ba'i sgra'ang mi grag ste /
K10D0112_H0115:433a-19: gzhan du na sangs rgyas kyi zhing de chos kyi sgra dang /
K10D0112_H0115:433a-20: yid du mi 'ong ba med pa'i sgras khyab pa yin no //
K10D0112_H0115:433a-21: de na sems can rnams kyang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du byed pa yin te /
K10D0112_H0115:433a-22: de na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg
K10D0112_H0115:433a-23: pa'i ming du gdags pa tsam yang mi srid do
K10D0112_H0115:433a-24: // ngas ni gang gi tshe bskal pa chen po
K10D0112_H0115:433b-0: gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma @433b snyed du snyigs ma
K10D0112_H0115:433b-1: lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa
K10D0112_H0115:433b-2: gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu tshig rtsub
K10D0112_H0115:433b-3: po dang 'jigs su rung bas sems can rnams srog
K10D0112_H0115:433b-4: gcod pa spong ba yang dag par 'dzin du bcug
K10D0112_H0115:433b-5: cing btsud de rab tu bkod pa nas /
K10D0112_H0115:433b-6: theg pa gsum po dag kyang yang dag par 'dzin
K10D0112_H0115:433b-7: du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod pa'i bar
K10D0112_H0115:433b-9: de'i las kyi 'phros da ltar nga nyon mongs pa
K10D0112_H0115:433b-10: dang ldan zhing mi dge ba'i sgras kun tu khyab
K10D0112_H0115:433b-11: la / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa'i
K10D0112_H0115:433b-12: sems can rnams kyis yongs su gang ba'i sangs rgyas
K10D0112_H0115:433b-13: kyi zhing 'di lta bu na theg pa gsum gyis
K10D0112_H0115:433b-14: la / chos ston te / ngas ni sngon ji
K10D0112_H0115:433b-15: ltar smon lam btang ba de lta bu'i sangs rgyas
K10D0112_H0115:433b-16: kyi zhing yongs su bzung zhing /
K10D0112_H0115:433b-17: ngas 'dul ba'i sems can ji lta bu dag yongs
K10D0112_H0115:433b-18: su bzung ba de lta bu kho na'i stobs dang
K10D0112_H0115:433b-20: 'bad pas byang chub kyi spyod pa spyad de /
K10D0112_H0115:433b-21: smon lam ji lta bu btab cing /
K10D0112_H0115:433b-22: sa bon ci 'dra ba btab pa de 'dra ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thob bo ////
K10D0112_H0115:433b-25: ji ltar ngas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod
K10D0112_H0115:433b-26: pa na sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba yongs su
K10D0112_H0115:433b-27: btang ba ltar / sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'
K10D0112_H0115:433b-28: gang gis kyang de lta bu'i sbyin pa yongs su
K10D0112_H0115:434a-2: ji ltar ngas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod
K10D0112_H0115:434a-3: pa na sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba yongs su
K10D0112_H0115:434a-4: btang ba ltar phyis 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub
K10D0112_H0115:434a-5: sems dpa' gang yang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa
K10D0112_H0115:434a-6: spyod pa na de lta bu'i sbyin pa yongs su
K10D0112_H0115:434a-7: gtong ba yongs su gtong bar mi 'gyur ba'i sbyin
K10D0112_H0115:434a-8: pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mdor bsdus te khyod
K10D0112_H0115:434a-10: skyes bu dam pa brgyad ni ma gtogs te /
K10D0112_H0115:434a-11: skyes bu dam pa sas byin zhes bya bar gyur
K10D0112_H0115:434a-12: pa ni lho phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams
K10D0112_H0115:434a-13: kun dbyangs zhes bya bar bla na med pa yang
K10D0112_H0115:434a-14: dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
K10D0112_H0115:434a-15: sangs rgyas te / de bzhin gshegs pa 'dres spong
K10D0112_H0115:434a-16: 'od zer zhes bya bar gyur nas skye dgu tshe
K10D0112_H0115:434a-17: lo brgya ba rnams la chos ston cing zhag bdun
K10D0112_H0115:434a-18: na yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro
K10D0112_H0115:434a-19: sangs rgyas te / // de bzhin du byang chub
K10D0112_H0115:434a-20: sems dpa' brtson 'grus yang dag skul zhes bya ba
K10D0112_H0115:434a-21: de ni shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams
K10D0112_H0115:434a-22: mi pham can zhes bya bar bla na med pa
K10D0112_H0115:434a-23: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
K10D0112_H0115:434a-25: skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya pa rnams la bskal pa
K10D0112_H0115:434a-26: gangg'a'i gi bye ma snyed las lhag pa snyed du
K10D0112_H0115:434b-0: sangs @434b rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad nas de'i tshe
K10D0112_H0115:434b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa de bla na med pa'i yongs
K10D0112_H0115:434b-2: su mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan
K10D0112_H0115:434b-3: las 'das te / da dung du'ang thugs rje chen
K10D0112_H0115:434b-4: po dang ldan pa de'i sku gdung rnams snyigs ma
K10D0112_H0115:434b-5: lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa
K10D0112_H0115:434b-6: dag na sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad do //
K10D0112_H0115:434b-7: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' snying po me tog rgyas zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus dang /
K10D0112_H0115:434b-9: yongs su gtong ba'i stobs kyi shugs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod de /
K10D0112_H0115:434b-10: de bskal pa chen po gangg'a'i klung bcu'i bye ma
K10D0112_H0115:434b-11: snyed 'das pa'i 'og tu 'di nas byang phyogs logs
K10D0112_H0115:434b-12: su snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
K10D0112_H0115:434b-13: zhing rgyur bcas yang dag 'dren ces bya ba zhig
K10D0112_H0115:434b-14: 'byung bar 'gyur ba der skyes bu dam pa de
K10D0112_H0115:434b-15: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
K10D0112_H0115:434b-16: chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te
K10D0112_H0115:434b-17: / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
K10D0112_H0115:434b-18: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyur bcas nag po rnam
K10D0112_H0115:434b-19: par 'joms pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba sangs rgyas
K10D0112_H0115:434b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro //
K10D0112_H0115:434b-21: byang chub sems dpa' shes rab 'od zer kun nas
K10D0112_H0115:434b-22: 'khrugs 'dzin ces bya ba'i skyes bu dam pa de
K10D0112_H0115:434b-23: ni bskal pa chen po gcig 'das nas nub phyogs
K10D0112_H0115:435a-0: @435a *// bar 'gyur te / de bzhin gshegs pa
K10D0112_H0115:435a-1: dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
K10D0112_H0115:435a-2: nyi ma'i snying po'i 'od zer dri ma med pa'i
K10D0112_H0115:435a-3: dbang po zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
K10D0112_H0115:435a-5: legs dga' 'di'ang bskal pa bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa snyed rdzogs pa'i 'og tu /
K10D0112_H0115:435a-6: steng gi phyogs logs su bskal pa chen po rtsod
K10D0112_H0115:435a-7: rnyog mi bzad yang dag 'khrug ces bya ba la
K10D0112_H0115:435a-8: snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
K10D0112_H0115:435a-9: 'gyur byed kyi mi gtsang bsags zhes bya ba zhig
K10D0112_H0115:435a-11: legs dga' 'di sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis
K10D0112_H0115:435a-12: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'gyur byed mi gtsang bsags zhes
K10D0112_H0115:435a-13: bya ba der skye dgu'i tshe lo lnga bcu pa
K10D0112_H0115:435a-14: rnams kyi nang du bla na med pa yang dag
K10D0112_H0115:435a-15: par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
K10D0112_H0115:435a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa bsam yas rnam par snang mdzad
K10D0112_H0115:435b-0: ces bya ba sangs rgyas @435b bcom ldan 'das kyi
K10D0112_H0115:435b-2: de sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis lo bcus
K10D0112_H0115:435b-3: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag mdzad nas yongs
K10D0112_H0115:435b-4: su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur te /
K10D0112_H0115:435b-5: de nyid kyi nyin mo de bzhin gshegs pa de'i
K10D0112_H0115:435b-6: dam pa'i chos kyang nub par 'gyur zhing lo bcu'i
K10D0112_H0115:435b-7: bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing de stongs par 'gyur
K10D0112_H0115:435b-8: ro // de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' rab
K10D0112_H0115:435b-9: tu lag brkyang 'di sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang
K10D0112_H0115:435b-10: gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'gyur byed mi gtsang bsags
K10D0112_H0115:435b-11: der skye dgu'i tshe lo sum cu pa rnams kyi
K10D0112_H0115:435b-12: nang du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
K10D0112_H0115:435b-13: pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
K10D0112_H0115:435b-14: ro // 'gyur te / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
K10D0112_H0115:435b-15: bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos
K10D0112_H0115:435b-16: rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba sangs rgyas bcom
K10D0112_H0115:435b-18: de'ang sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis lo bcus sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag mdzad nas /
K10D0112_H0115:435b-19: phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das
K10D0112_H0115:435b-20: pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar
K10D0112_H0115:435b-21: 'gyur te / de'i dam pa'i chos ni lo bdun du gnas par 'gyur ro //
K10D0112_H0115:435b-22: de nas skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyis sngar
K10D0112_H0115:435b-23: lung bstan pa thob cing bla na med pa yang
K10D0112_H0115:436a-1: pa'i byang chub kyi ro myang ba thob nas bcom
K10D0112_H0115:436a-2: ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te
K10D0112_H0115:436a-5: mchog tu dga' bas ta la bdun srid tsam du
K10D0112_H0115:436a-6: steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags shing thal
K10D0112_H0115:436a-8: bcom ldan 'das la dbyangs gcig gis tshigs su bcad de gsol pa /
K10D0112_H0115:436a-9: sangs rgyas nyi ma bzhin du lhang de zhing //
K10D0112_H0115:436a-11: rnam 'dren rdul bral rnam dag spyan mnga' ba /
K10D0112_H0115:436a-12: snang gyur ba de gshegs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0112_H0115:436a-13: khyod ni byang chub dam pa 'tshol ba na //
K10D0112_H0115:436a-14: bskal pa mang por khyod kyis brtson 'grus bsgoms //
K10D0112_H0115:436a-15: khyod kyi sngon gyi rgyal mang gang mchod pa //
K10D0112_H0115:436a-16: 'das pa'i 'dren pa de yis lung ma bstan //
K10D0112_H0115:436a-17: 'dod chags spangs pa yongs grol thugs mnga' ba /

K10D0112_H0115:437b-14: rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug

K10D0112_H0115:442b-9: lus ngan la gsol ba 'debs pa nas /

K10D0112_H0115:443a-14: na bdag gi bsam pa 'di yang yongs su rdzogs
K10D0112_H0115:443a-15: par gyur cig / bdag dzambu'i gling du ded dpon

K10D0112_H0115:443b-6: / / gling re rer yang lan bdun bdun du
K10D0112_H0115:443b-7: rin po che sna tshogs kyi char dag mngon par
K10D0112_H0115:443b-9: de ltar sems can dpag tu med pa grangs med

K10D0112_H0115:443b-11: su rdzogs par byas shing theg pa gsum po dag

K10D0112_H0115:443b-17: 'og tu bskal pa mgu byed ces bya ba byung

K10D0112_H0115:443b-25: pha rol gnon pa dang bcas la /

K10D0112_H0115:444b-24: brgya byin gyi drang srong rnams dang /
